news.title: Investors are growing concerned about a U.S. asset exodus as Treasuries and the dollar decline
news.summary: The combined decline of U.S. stocks, bonds and the dollar could be a sign of a broader shift away from investing in America.

news.title: How China used Vietnam to evade higher U.S. tariffs
news.summary: Vietnam is the 6th largest source of U.S. imports. It is caught in the middle of an escalating trade war between the United States and China.

news.title: 10-year Treasury yield tops 4.5% after surge this week that's worrying Wall Street and the White House
news.summary: The 10-year Treasury yield was higher on Friday. The bond market sell-off was influenced by U.S. President Donald Trump's fast-changing tariff policies.

news.title: Customs 'glitch' impacting Trump tariffs fixed after lasting for more than 10 hours
news.summary: A Customs notice reported a glitch in a system shippers use to exempt freight from tariffs. Logistics experts say it is a bad sign for the supply chain.

news.title: Third Point, D.E. Shaw obtain agreements with CoStar. How the activists can build value
news.summary: Third Point and D.E. Shaw are like-minded investors obtaining separate agreements with CoStar. Third Point: CoStar will be used as a tool for investors to track their investments.

news.title: Tesla’s stock is set for a ‘death cross’ on Monday: 3 reasons why it’s a risky buy
news.summary: Tesla’s 50-day moving average is about to cross the 200-day, a bearish signal. Meanwhile, vehicle sales are slumping, while the valuation remains high.

news.title: The IRS is pulling back on some audits — but not everyone can breathe a sigh of relief
news.summary: With massive cuts to the IRS workforce, the question now is whether the tax collector is waving the white flag on audits. The IRS has said it will continue to audit taxpayers.

news.title: The era of zombie television: Why is there never anything to watch on cable?
news.summary: More than 60 million U.S. homes still have cable. They largely get reality shows, old movies and 21-hour-long blocs of "Law & Order: Special Victims Unit"

news.title: What could a Trump recession look like? The economic outlook is bad — or worse.
news.summary: There are two options now: The U.S. economy will either muddle through a soft patch, or fall into a sudden downturn.

news.title: Gold is at a fresh record high. Does it still make sense to buy?
news.summary: Gold isn’t for the end of the world — it’s for the world we’re in, says one precious-metals dealer.
